languages.text: "Голоски мне все про тебя нашептали, ледышка... хотя какая ты теперь ледышка, а? Таешь весь по краям, словно изморозь на выключенном конденсаторе. Ха!"
"My little whisperers have told me all about you, iceman... but you're not frozen anymore, are you? You're starting to melt a little bit. Did somebody leave the door to the cold-storage open? Ha!"
languages.original_text: "Голоски мне все про тебя нашептали, ледышка... хотя какая ты теперь ледышка, а? Таешь весь по краям, словно изморозь на выключенном конденсаторе. Ха!"

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My little whisperers have told me all about you, iceman... but you're not frozen anymore, are you? You're starting to melt a little bit. Did somebody leave the door to the cold-storage open? Ha!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “我那些小小的低语者已经把你的事情全都告诉我了，冰人儿……你没那么冷冰冰了，对不对？看得出来，你有些融化了。是不是有谁忘了关上冷冻库的大门？哈！”
languages.original_text: "My little whisperers have told me all about you, iceman... but you're not frozen anymore, are you? You're starting to melt a little bit. Did somebody leave the door to the cold-storage open? Ha!"

traits.locale_text: “我那些小小的低语者已经把你的事情全都告诉我了，冰人儿……你没那么冷冰冰了，对不对？看得出来，你有些融化了。是不是有谁忘了关上冷冻库的大门？哈！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai entendu beaucoup de murmures à votre sujet, le rabat-joie... mais vous vous réchauffez un peu, je me trompe ? Je dirais même que la glace commence à fondre. Quelqu'un aurait-il laissé la porte du congélateur ouverte ? Ha ! »
languages.original_text: "My little whisperers have told me all about you, iceman... but you're not frozen anymore, are you? You're starting to melt a little bit. Did somebody leave the door to the cold-storage open? Ha!"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai entendu beaucoup de murmures à votre sujet, le rabat-joie... mais vous vous réchauffez un peu, je me trompe ? Je dirais même que la glace commence à fondre. Quelqu'un aurait-il laissé la porte du congélateur ouverte ? Ha ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Mis pequeños susurros me lo han contado todo sobre usted, hombre de hielo... ya no está tan congelado, ¿verdad? Está empezando a derretirse. ¿Ha dejado alguien la puerta de la cámara frigorífica abierta? ¡Ja!».
languages.original_text: "My little whisperers have told me all about you, iceman... but you're not frozen anymore, are you? You're starting to melt a little bit. Did somebody leave the door to the cold-storage open? Ha!"

traits.locale_text: «Mis pequeños susurros me lo han contado todo sobre usted, hombre de hielo... ya no está tan congelado, ¿verdad? Está empezando a derretirse. ¿Ha dejado alguien la puerta de la cámara frigorífica abierta? ¡Ja!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「小さなささやき声が、あなたのことを全部話してくれたわ、アイスマン…でも、あなたもう凍ってないのよね？少し溶け始めているみたい。誰か保冷庫のドアを開けっ放しにしてたの？えぇ！」
languages.original_text: "My little whisperers have told me all about you, iceman... but you're not frozen anymore, are you? You're starting to melt a little bit. Did somebody leave the door to the cold-storage open? Ha!"

traits.locale_text: 「小さなささやき声が、あなたのことを全部話してくれたわ、アイスマン…でも、あなたもう凍ってないのよね？少し溶け始めているみたい。誰か保冷庫のドアを開けっ放しにしてたの？えぇ！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Meine kleinen Flüsterer haben mir alles über Euch erzählt, Eismann ... aber Ihr seid gar nicht mehr eingefroren, nicht wahr? Ihr fangt langsam an, ein wenig aufzutauen. Hat vielleicht jemand die Tür zum Kühlraum offen stehen lassen? Ha!"
languages.original_text: "My little whisperers have told me all about you, iceman... but you're not frozen anymore, are you? You're starting to melt a little bit. Did somebody leave the door to the cold-storage open? Ha!"

traits.locale_text: "Meine kleinen Flüsterer haben mir alles über Euch erzählt, Eismann ... aber Ihr seid gar nicht mehr eingefroren, nicht wahr? Ihr fangt langsam an, ein wenig aufzutauen. Hat vielleicht jemand die Tür zum Kühlraum offen stehen lassen? Ha!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "My little whisperers have told me all about you, iceman... but you're not frozen anymore, are you? You're starting to melt a little bit. Did somebody leave the door to the cold-storage open? Ha!"

languages.text: "Minik fısıldayanlarımdan her şeyini öğrendim buz küpü... Gerçi sen şimdi çözülmüş oldun ya. Ufak ufak eriyorsun. Ne o, buzluğun kapağı mı açık kaldı?"
languages.original_text: "My little whisperers have told me all about you, iceman... but you're not frozen anymore, are you? You're starting to melt a little bit. Did somebody leave the door to the cold-storage open? Ha!"

traits.locale_text: "Minik fısıldayanlarımdan her şeyini öğrendim buz küpü... Gerçi sen de çözüldün, değil mi? Ufak ufak eriyorsun şimdi. Ne o, buzluğun kapağı mı açık kaldı?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
